author: Sharda Ugra
title: 'There has to be a format where the bowlers are able to challenge batters' | ESPNcricinfo.com - ESPNcricinfo.com
description:
1. 'There has to be a format where the bowlers are able to challenge batters' | ESPNcricinfo.com  ESPNcricinfo.com
  2. Sara Tendulkar wishes father Sachin on his 47th birthday with throwback post on Instagram - Republic World  Republic World
    3. …
content: It's not the time to be fussing over birthdays and celebrations, and Sachin Tendulkar doesn't have his 47th on his mind. The days he has kept track of instead are the number he has spent indoors in his home in Mumbai, without meeting a single outsider. Count … [+10384 chars]
